name: Questioner
description: Questioner helps the meetup organizer prioritize questions to be answered    ## Built with * [HTML](https://www.w3schools.com/html/) - The markup language used * [CSS](https://www.w3schools.com/css/default.asp) - The style sheet used * [JS](https://www.w3schools.com/js/default.asp) - The scripting language * [FLASK](http://flask.pocoo.org/) - The backend framework used    ## Authors * **Ogutu Brian** - *Initial work* - [Ogutu Brian](https://github.com/Ogutu-Brian)    ## Acknowledgements * Hat tip to w3schools for the guide on html,css and Javascript * Inspiration by Andela workshop session    * Hat tip to **Munira Omar** for help with git work flow - [Munira](https://github.com/munniomer)
